settings.para: Rigorously tested through clinical trials, our legacy formulas have proven their effectiveness in independent studies, demonstrating our commitment to delivering research-backed, rigorous dietary supplements.

settings.bottom_p: The active components we've refined over time stand as the most promising natural silica compounds developed to date. Silicium Laboratories currently continues to push the boundaries of science with clinical trials and research to improve the science behind its products.
settings.f1p: These studies demonstrate the safety & the non-toxicity of our products.
settings.f2p: All batches of our products are individually analyzed to guarantee the quality and safety of our products.
settings.f3p: The development of our products is supported and protected by international patents.
settings.f4p: Proven by independent clinical studies conducted by leading European, American, and British university researchers.
settings.f5p: We've eliminated preservatives, opting for natural processing methods to maintain product integrity.
settings.f6p: Confirmed the sustained quality and safety of products throughout their shelf life.

settings.bl_text:
Dr. Anderson
FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF JUIZ DE FORA
Brazil – 2018

settings.g_texts:
LIVING SILICA® is the only proprietary formula that delivers significant improvement in skin imperfections, skin hydration, skin luminosity, and facial appearance. 
Clinical trial in middle-aged women, administered for 150 days, 5 mg Silica/day.

settings.p_text: Appearance of Fine Lines & Healthy-Toned Skin*

Dr. Del Bas
TECHNOLOGICAL CENTER OF NUTRITION AND HEALTH
Spain – 2014

settings.g_texts: Treatment: LIVING SILICA®, in vitro culture of MG-63 Osteoblast Cells (bone precursors) in 15 days of treatment.

A six-week observational trial conducted with LIVING SILICA® reported significant improvements in joint mobility, flexibility, and reduced limitations in daily activities. 6 weeks trial, 30mL/day, and daily gel application.

settings.bl_text: Dr. N. Boqué Eurecat / Technological Center of Catalonia Spain – 2015

settings.g_texts: According to independent clinical trials conducted in the UK and Spain, LIVING SILICA®'s proprietary ingredient demonstrates the highest absorption rate (64%).Research demonstrated that is 4 to 10 times more bioavailable than standard forms found in both food and food supplements, highlighting its superior assimilation in humans.

settings.top_heading: at the heart of everything we do

settings.g_texts: LIVING SILICA® is Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) for its intended use, consistent with section 201(s) of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act. Additionally, we are certified under ISO22000:2018 Food Safety and Safety. This certification confirms our adherence to the highest standards in the storage and distribution of food supplements, enabling us to deliver products of the utmost quality to our customers.

settings.title: Molecular Form
settings.text: The high content of monomeric silicic acid in LIVING SILICA® liquid and solid products is quantified as part of the quality assurance process. Silicium´s orthosilicic acid is found in high proportion in the most assimilable form.

settings.title: Absorption through the skin
settings.text: The study evaluated silicon content, ex vivo skin permeation, cytotoxicity with cell viability assay and antioxidant activity. 60% Silicon absorption through the skin.

settings.title: In vitro Bioavailability
settings.text: Comparative of brand X shows “E” and another Brand shows “N”, by inductively coupled plasma mass spectrophotometry (ICP-MS), and quantified the content of soluble silica in aqueous medium. It is concluded thatLIVINGSILICA®Powder® has a higher content of soluble silicon compared to other samples on the market.

settings.para: The high content of monomeric silicic acic in LIVING SILICA® is quantified as part of the quality assurance process. Silicium´s orthosilicic acid is found in high proportion in the most assimilable form. *Dr. ENANTIA, Spain – 2017

The study evaluated silicon content, ex vivo skin permeation, cytotoxicity with cell viability assay and antioxidant activity. 60% Silicon absorption through the skin.                                          *Dr. Polonini, ORTOFARMA LABORATORY Brazil – 2019

Comparative analysis using inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) quantified the content of soluble silica in an aqueous medium. This analysis found that LIVING SILICA® powder has higher soluble silicon content than other brands.

Studies conducted by the:      Meriuex Nutriscience Center have solidly confirmed the exceptional efficacy of our products:                                          in promoting and sustaining healthy joints, as well as in significantly alleviating discomforting aches.*

Research by Federal University Juiz de Fora found LIVING SILICA® liquid and capsules effective in enhancing skin, hair, and nails, improving the appearance of fine lines, and promoting healthy-toned skin in general.

The ORTOFARMA LAB. concluded that, compared to other samples on the market, LIVING SILICA® Powder® has a higher content of soluble silica, being the silica with the best bioavailability on the market.
